name: Signed Werner Kok BIL Jersey & Tackle Video Clip
description: Stand a chance to invest in a rising star by bidding on the signed jersey worn by Werner Kok during the Sharks' 2021 game against the British and Irish Lions. Werner is an excellent player whose skills will take him far – this means that the jersey stands to become a valuable collectible. Additionally, the winning bidder will receive an NFT-backed video clip of Werner's spectacular tackle against the BIL. The winning bidder will receive an NFT that gives the holder ownership of this jersey. The NFT owner can elect to have the item shipped to them, or to keep it safe in the Shark Vault to redeem or trade at a later stage. The full price of the winning bid will go towards the clean-up efforts in KZN. If the NFT is resold again in future, 10% of the sales price will go back to The Sharks' charitable efforts.
